string.name: wp_two_factor_delivery_selection_title
string.context: Title for screen that prompts the user to select a delivery method for a one-time code during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: Uw identiteit controleren

string.name: wp_two_factor_delivery_selection_instructions_login
string.context: Instructions for the user on the screen that prompts the user to select a delivery method for a one-time code during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: U moet nu een beveiligingscode voor eenmalig gebruik invoeren om uw identiteit te verifiëren.

string.name: wp_two_factor_delivery_selection_instructions_opt_in
string.context: Instructions for the user on the screen that prompts the user to select a delivery method for a one-time code during the two-factor opt-in/opt-out workflow.

resources.string: Om het bijwerken van uw instellingen voor verificatie in twee stappen te voltooien, moeten we u een beveiligingscode toesturen.

string.name: wp_two_factor_delivery_selection_prompt
string.context: Prompt for the user on the screen that prompts the user to select a delivery method for a one-time code during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: Hoe wilt u uw code ontvangen?

string.name: wp_two_factor_send_code_email_button
string.context: Label for a button that sends a one-time code to the user's email during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: Via e-mail

string.name: wp_two_factor_send_code_sms_button
string.context: Label for a button that sends a one-time code to the user's phone via SMS during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: Via sms

string.name: wp_two_factor_get_code_totp_button
string.context: Label for a button that prompts the user to get a one-time code from their authenticator app during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: Opvragen bij authenticator-app

string.name: wp_two_factor_sms_terms_and_conditions_button
string.context: Label for a button that launches an organization's terms and conditions pertaining to the use of SMS.

resources.string: Algemene voorwaarden

string.name: wp_two_factor_sms_privacy_policy_button
string.context: Label for a button that launches an organization's privacy policy pertaining to the use of SMS.

resources.string: Privacybeleid

string.name: wp_two_factor_authentication_title
string.context: Title for screen that prompts the user to enter and authenticate a one-time code during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: Uw identiteit controleren

string.name: wp_two_factor_authentication_instructions_email
string.context: Instructions for the user on the screen that prompts the user to enter and authenticate a one-time code during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: We hebben een beveiligingscode verzonden naar het bij ons bekende e-mailadres.

string.name: wp_two_factor_authentication_instructions_sms
string.context: Instructions for the user on the screen that prompts the user to enter and authenticate a one-time code during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: We hebben een beveiligingscode verzonden naar het bij ons bekende telefoonnummer.

string.name: wp_two_factor_authentication_instructions_with_receiving_location
string.context: Instructions for the user on the screen that prompts the user to enter and authenticate a one-time code during the two-factor authentication workflow. %1$@ is the email address or phone number the code was sent to.

resources.string: We hebben een beveiligingscode verzonden naar %1$@.

string.name: wp_two_factor_authentication_instructions_totp
string.context: Instructions for the user on the screen that prompts the user to enter and authenticate a one-time code during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: Gebruik uw authenticator-app om een beveiligingscode op te vragen.

string.name: wp_two_factor_authentication_prompt
string.context: Prompt for the user on the screen that prompts the user to to enter and authenticate a one-time code during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: Voer hieronder uw code in om door te gaan:

string.name: wp_two_factor_code_entry_hint
string.context: Hint/placeholder text for field in which a user will enter their one-time code during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: Code invoeren

string.name: wp_two_factor_trust_device_switch_label
string.context: Label for the trust device switch, which users can switch on to skip two-factor authentication during subsequent logins from the current device.

resources.string: Dit apparaat vertrouwen

string.name: wp_two_factor_resend_code_label
string.context: Label above the button that resends the one-time code to the user during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: Uw code niet ontvangen?

string.name: wp_two_factor_resend_code_button
string.context: Label for a button that resends the one-time code to the user during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: Code opnieuw verzenden

string.name: wp_two_factor_resend_code_confirmation_email
string.context: Confirmation message that displays when a user re-sends the one-time code during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: We hebben de beveiligingscode opnieuw verzonden naar het bij ons bekende e-mailadres.

string.name: wp_two_factor_resend_code_confirmation_sms
string.context: Confirmation message that displays when a user re-sends the one-time code during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: We hebben de beveiligingscode opnieuw verzonden naar het bij ons bekende telefoonnummer.

string.name: wp_two_factor_resend_code_confirmation_with_receiving_location
string.context: Confirmation message that displays when a user re-sends the one-time code during the two-factor authentication workflow. %1$@ is the email address or phone number the code was sent to.

resources.string: We hebben opnieuw een beveiligingscode verzonden naar %1$@.

string.name: wp_two_factor_authenticate_code_button
string.context: Label for a button that authenticates the one-time code entered by the user during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: Controleren

string.name: wp_two_factor_authentication_success_accessibility_announcement
string.context: Accessibility message announced when a user successfully authenticates a one-time code during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: Gelukt!

string.name: wp_two_factor_missing_contact_info_title
string.context: Title for screen that explains that the user must contact their clinic and update their contact information during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: Uw identiteit controleren

string.name: wp_two_factor_missing_contact_info_instructions_p1
string.context: First paragraph of instructions for the user on the screen that explains that the user must contact their clinic and update their contact information during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: We moeten uw identiteit controleren door u een beveiligingscode voor eenmalig gebruik te verzenden, maar we hebben van u geen contactinformatie in het systeem.

string.name: wp_two_factor_missing_contact_info_instructions_p2_prelogin
string.context: Second paragraph of instructions for the user on the screen that explains that the user must contact their clinic and update their contact information during the two-factor authentication workflow in a prelogin context.

resources.string: Neem contact op met uw polikliniek om ervoor te zorgen dat we uw e-mailadres of mobiel telefoonnummer hebben voordat u nogmaals probeert in te loggen.

string.name: wp_two_factor_missing_contact_info_instructions_p2_postlogin
string.context: Second paragraph of instructions for the user on the screen that explains that the user must update their contact information during the two-factor authentication workflow in a post-login context.

resources.string: Werk uw informatie bij om ervoor te zorgen dat we uw e-mailadres of mobiel telefoonnummer hebben en probeer het nogmaals.

string.name: wp_two_factor_onboarding_button
string.context: Label for a button that launches the onboarding screen, which explains the two-factor authentication workflow to the user.

resources.string: Meer info

string.name: wp_two_factor_onboarding_title
string.context: Title for screen that explains the two-factor authentication workflow to the user.

resources.string: Uw identiteit controleren

string.name: wp_two_factor_onboarding_explanation
string.context: High-level explanation of the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: Het is ons doel om ervoor te zorgen dat uw gezondheidsinformatie veilig is. Voordat u inlogt, dient u een beveiligingscode voor eenmalig gebruik in te voeren om uw identiteit te controleren.

string.name: wp_two_factor_onboarding_step_one_accessibility_label
string.context: Accessibility label for the description for the first step of the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: Stap één

string.name: wp_two_factor_onboarding_step_one_all_methods
string.context: User-friendly description for the first step of the two-factor authentication workflow. This description is used when the organization allows all delivery methods.

resources.string: U ontvangt een code via sms-bericht, e-mail of in uw authenticator-app.

string.name: wp_two_factor_onboarding_step_one_sms_email
string.context: User-friendly description for the first step of the two-factor authentication workflow. This description is used when the organization allows sms or email delivery.

resources.string: U ontvangt een code via sms-bericht of e-mail.

string.name: wp_two_factor_onboarding_step_one_sms_totp
string.context: User-friendly description for the first step of the two-factor authentication workflow. This description is used when the organization allows sms or authenticator app code delivery.

resources.string: U ontvangt een code via sms-bericht of in uw authenticator-app.

string.name: wp_two_factor_onboarding_step_one_email_totp
string.context: User-friendly description for the first step of the two-factor authentication workflow. This description is used when the organization allows email or authenticator app code delivery.

resources.string: U ontvangt een code via e-mail of in uw authenticator-app.

string.name: wp_two_factor_onboarding_step_one_sms_only
string.context: User-friendly description for the first step of the two-factor authentication workflow. This description is used when the organization only allows sms code delivery.

resources.string: U ontvangt een code via sms-bericht.

string.name: wp_two_factor_onboarding_step_one_email_only
string.context: User-friendly description for the first step of the two-factor authentication workflow. This description is used when the organization only allows email code delivery.

resources.string: U ontvangt een code via e-mail.

string.name: wp_two_factor_onboarding_step_two_accessibility_label
string.context: Accessibility label for the description for the second step of the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: Stap twee

string.name: wp_two_factor_onboarding_step_two
string.context: User-friendly description for the second step of the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: Voer de code die u heeft ontvangen ter controle in in deze app.

string.name: wp_two_factor_onboarding_step_three_accessibility_label
string.context: Accessibility label for the description for the third step of the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: Stap drie

string.name: wp_two_factor_onboarding_step_three
string.context: User-friendly description for the third step of the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: U bent ingelogd meteen nadat we uw identiteit hebben gecontroleerd.

string.name: wp_two_factor_settings_section_title
string.context: Title for the section of settings related to two-factor authentication.

resources.string: Verificatie in twee stappen

string.name: wp_two_factor_opt_in_email_only_setting_title
string.context: Title for the setting that allows the user to opt in-to/out-of email-based two-factor authentication.

resources.string: E-mail

string.name: wp_two_factor_opt_in_sms_only_setting_title
string.context: Title for the setting that allows the user to opt in-to/out-of sms-based two-factor authentication.

resources.string: Sms-bericht

string.name: wp_two_factor_opt_in_email_sms_setting_title
string.context: Title for the setting that allows the user to opt in-to/out-of email OR sms-based two-factor authentication.

resources.string: E-mail of sms-bericht

string.name: wp_two_factor_opt_in_totp_setting_title
string.context: Title for the setting that allows the user to opt in-to/out-of totp-based two-factor authentication.

resources.string: Authenticator-app

string.name: wp_two_factor_opt_in_setting_description
string.context: Description for the setting that allows the user to opt in-to/out-of two-factor authentication.

resources.string: Verificatie in twee stappen gebruiken om een extra beveiligingslaag toe te voegen aan uw account.

string.name: wp_two_factor_opt_in_confirm_title
string.context: Title for screen that confirms that the user has successfully opted-in-to/opted-out-of two-factor authentication.

resources.string: Update afgerond

string.name: wp_two_factor_opt_in_confirm_subtitle_opt_in
string.context: Subtitle for screen that confirms that the user has successfully opted-in-to two-factor authentication.

resources.string: Verificatie via e-mail en sms-bericht is nu ingeschakeld.

string.name: wp_two_factor_opt_in_confirm_subtitle_opt_out
string.context: Subtitle for screen that confirms that the user has successfully opted-out-of two-factor authentication.

resources.string: Verificatie via e-mail en sms-bericht is nu uitgeschakeld.

string.name: wp_two_factor_opt_in_confirm_reminder_opt_in
string.context: Reminder that displays to the user, after opting-in, that two-factor authentication helps increase security

resources.string: Deze extra beveiligingslaag helpt uw account te beschermen.

string.name: wp_two_factor_opt_in_confirm_reminder_opt_out
string.context: Reminder that displays to the user, after opting-out, that they can opt-in-to two-factor authentication later.

resources.string: U kunt deze beveiligingsfunctionaliteit op elk gewenst moment weer inschakelen.

string.name: wp_two_factor_opt_in_finish_button
string.context: Label for a button that finishes the two-factor opt-in/opt-out workflow and returns the user to Account Settings.

resources.string: Afronden

string.name: wp_two_factor_verify_info_title
string.context: Title for screen that prompts the user to update their contact information during the two-factor opt-in/opt-out workflow.

resources.string: Uw informatie verifiëren

string.name: wp_two_factor_verify_info_instructions
string.context: Instructions for the user on the screen that prompts the user to provide required information during the two-factor opt-in and enrollment workflows.

resources.string: Verificatie in twee stappen gebruikt de contactgegevens in ons systeem om uw identiteit te bevestigen, dus moeten we controleren of alle gegevens zijn bijgewerkt.

string.name: wp_two_factor_verify_info_instructions_password_only
string.context: Instructions for the user on the screen that prompts the user to provide required information during the two-factor opt-out workflow.

resources.string: Verificatie in twee stappen voegt een extra beveiligingslaag toe aan uw account, dus moeten we uw identiteit verifiëren voordat u kunt doorgaan.

string.name: wp_two_factor_verify_info_prompt
string.context: Prompt for the user on the screen that prompts the user to provide required information during the two-factor opt-in and enrollment workflows.

resources.string: Verifieer de onderstaande informatie om door te gaan:

string.name: wp_two_factor_verify_info_prompt_password_only
string.context: Prompt for the user on the screen that prompts the user to provide their password the two-factor opt-in/opt-out workflow.

resources.string: Voer uw wachtwoord hieronder in om door te gaan:

string.name: wp_two_factor_verify_info_continue_button
string.context: Label for a button that continues the two-factor opt-in/opt-out workflow after the user has provided the required information.

resources.string: Doorgaan

string.name: wp_two_factor_email_label
string.context: Label above the field where the user enters their email address during the two-factor opt-in/opt-out workflow.

resources.string: E-mailadres

string.name: wp_two_factor_phone_label
string.context: Label above the field where the user enters their phone number during the two-factor opt-in/opt-out workflow.

resources.string: Telefoonnummer

string.name: wp_two_factor_password_label
string.context: Label above the field where the user enters their password during the two-factor opt-in/opt-out workflow.

resources.string: Wachtwoord

string.name: wp_two_factor_enrollment_title
string.context: Title for screen that prompts the user to set up two-factor authentication for their account during the two-factor enrollment workflow.

resources.string: Uw account beveiligen

string.name: wp_two_factor_enrollment_instructions_required
string.context: Instructions for the user on the screen that requires the user to set up two-factor authentication for their account during the two-factor enrollment workflow.

resources.string: Voordat u inlogt, dient verificatie in twee stappen in te stellen om een extra beveiligingslaag toe te voegen aan uw account.

string.name: wp_two_factor_enrollment_warning_title
string.context: Title for a warning message popup that displays when prompting the user to confirm their decision to skip enrollment and turn off two-factor authentication for their account.

resources.string: Weet u het zeker?

string.name: wp_two_factor_enrollment_warning_message
string.context: Warning message that displays when prompting the user to confirm their decision to skip enrollment and turn off two-factor authentication for their account.

resources.string: Verificatie in twee stappen is belangrijk voor het veilig houden van uw account. Door deze beveiligingsfunctionaliteit uit te schakelen, brengt u mogelijk uw gezondheidsinformatie in gevaar.

string.name: wp_two_factor_enrollment_warning_cancel_button
string.context: Label for a button that cancels the user's decision to skip enrollment and turn off two-factor authentication for their account.

resources.string: Teruggaan

string.name: wp_two_factor_enrollment_warning_confirm_button
string.context: Label for a button that confirms the user's decision to skip enrollment and turn off two-factor authentication for their account.

resources.string: Uitschakelen

string.name: wp_two_factor_enrollment_continue_button
string.context: Label for a button that finishes the two-factor enrollment workflow and continues the login process.

resources.string: Doorgaan

string.name: wp_two_factor_error_wrong_code
string.context: Error message that displays when the user has entered the wrong one-time code during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: U heeft de verkeerde code ingevoerd. Probeer het nogmaals.

string.name: wp_two_factor_error_account_disabled_title
string.context: Title for an error message popup that displays during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: Te veel pogingen

string.name: wp_two_factor_error_account_disabled_message
string.context: Error message that displays when the user has entered the wrong one-time code too many times (thus disabling their account) during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: U heeft te veel keren geprobeerd in te loggen en uw account is gedeactiveerd. Neem contact op met uw zorgorganisatie om uw account opnieuw te activeren.

string.name: wp_two_factor_error_must_logout_title
string.context: Title for an error message popup that displays during the two-factor opt-in/opt-out workflow.

resources.string: Te veel pogingen

string.name: wp_two_factor_error_must_logout_message_code
string.context: Error message that displays when the user has entered the wrong one-time code too many times during the two-factor opt-in/opt-out workflow.

resources.string: U heeft te vaak geprobeerd een onjuiste code te gebruiken. Ter bescherming van uw account wordt u nu uitgelogd.

string.name: wp_two_factor_error_must_logout_message_password
string.context: Error message that displays when the user has entered the wrong password too many times during the two-factor opt-in/opt-out workflow.

resources.string: U heeft te vaak geprobeerd een onjuist wachtwoord te gebruiken. Ter bescherming van uw account wordt u nu uitgelogd.

string.name: wp_two_factor_error_must_logout_message
string.context: Error message that displays when the user has entered the wrong password OR one-time code too many times during the two-factor opt-in/opt-out workflow.

resources.string: U heeft te vaak geprobeerd een onjuist wachtwoord of code te gebruiken. Ter bescherming van uw account wordt u nu uitgelogd.

string.name: wp_two_factor_error_code_expired
string.context: Error message that displays when the user has entered an expired one-time code during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: De code die u heeft ingevoerd is verlopen. Verzend uw code opnieuw.

string.name: wp_two_factor_error_incorrect_password
string.context: Error message that displays when the user has entered the wrong password during the two-factor opt-in/opt-out workflow.

resources.string: Het door u ingevoerde wachtwoord is onjuist.

string.name: wp_two_factor_error_invalid_email
string.context: Error message that displays when the user has entered an invalid email address during the two-factor opt-in/opt-out workflow.

resources.string: Het door u ingevoerde e-mailadres is ongeldig.

string.name: wp_two_factor_error_invalid_phone
string.context: Error message that displays when the user has entered an invalid phone number during the two-factor opt-in/opt-out workflow.

resources.string: Het door u ingevoerde telefoonnummer is ongeldig.

string.name: wp_two_factor_error_unknown
string.context: Error message that displays when authentication of a one-time code has failed for an unknown reason during the two-factor authentication workflow.

resources.string: Probleem bij communiceren met de server. Probeer het later nogmaals.

string.name: wp_two_factor_error_send_code_failure
string.context: Error message that displays when sending code to the user failed.

resources.string: Fout bij verzenden van code. Probeer het later nogmaals of neem contact op met de klantenservice.

string.context: Button title to manage organizations for the login screen

resources.string: Organisaties bewerken

string.context: Text for a button to indicate that changes made are done

resources.string: Klaar

string.context: Button title to initiate login with Biometrics (finger or face)

resources.string: Inloggen met biometrie

string.context: (iOS only) Button title to initiate login with Apple Touch Id

string.context: (iOS only) Button title to initiate login with Apple Face ID

string.context: (iOS only) Button title to initiate login with Apple Optic ID

string.context: Button title to initiate login with Passcode

resources.string: Inloggen met wachtwoordcode

string.context: Link title to initiate login with username and password. Where %1$@ is what the organization calls username and %2$@ is what the organization calls password.

resources.string: Of log in met %1$@ en %2$@

string.name: wp_login_use_other_options
string.context: Link title to initiate login with other methods (SAML, passcode, biometrics, etc).

resources.string: Of log in via een andere methode

string.name: wp_login_use_remember_username
string.context: Check box to remember username. Where %1$@ is what the organization calls username.

resources.string: %1$@ onthouden

string.context: Accessibility label for check box to remember username when it is checked. Where %1$@ is what the organization calls username.

resources.string: %1$@ onthouden, aangevinkt

string.context: Accessibility label for check box to remember username when it is not checked. Where %1$@ is what the organization calls username.

resources.string: %1$@ onthouden, niet aangevinkt

string.context: Default name for the login username

string.context: Button to launch need help for logging in.

resources.string: Hulp nodig?

string.name: wp_login_banner_tap_for_more
string.context: The banner text with a tap for more at the end. Where %1$@ is the banner text supplied by the customer. Do not put content on both sides of the %1$@, else the formatting will be wrong.

string.name: wp_login_accessibility_more_options
string.context: The accessibility button name for the more settings on the login screen.

string.context: Link to launch forgot username. Where %1$@ is what the organization calls username.

string.name: wp_login_forgot_password
string.context: Link to launch forgot password. Where %1$@ is what the organization calls password.

resources.string: %1$@ vergeten?

string.name: wp_login_accessibility_show_password
string.context: Content description for accessibility for Show Password. %1$@ is what the org calls password

resources.string: %1$@ tonen

string.name: wp_login_accessibility_hide_password
string.context: Content description for accessibility for Hide Password. %1$@ is what the org calls password

string.name: wp_login_accessibility_remember_username
string.context: Content description for accessibility for Remember Username. %1$@ is what the org calls username

string.name: wp_login_accessibility_remember_username_checked
string.context: Content description for accessibility for Remember Username when checked. %1$@ is what the org calls username

string.name: wp_login_accessibility_remember_username_unchecked
string.context: Content description for accessibility for Remember Username when unchecked. %1$@ is what the org calls username

resources.string: %1$@ onthouden is gedeselecteerd

string.name: wp_login_accessibility_add_org_card
string.context: Content description for accessibility view pager dot group. This is the name of the add organization card

resources.string: Organisatie toevoegen

string.name: wp_login_accessibility_view_pager
string.context: Content description for accessibility view pager dot group. Where %1$@ is the organization name they are viewing and %2$@ is the total orgs in the list. Including the add organization view.

resources.string: %1$@ bekijken in een lijst van %2$@.

string.name: wp_login_accessibility_view_pager_dot_selection
string.context: Content description for accessibility of a dot in the view pager group. Where %1$@ is the organization name they would view.

resources.string: %1$@ bekijken

string.name: wp_login_empty_field
string.context: Alert that appears when the user attempted to log in without a username or without a password. %1$@ is the name of the field

resources.string: Het veld %1$@ is leeg. Voer een %1$@ in.

string.name: wp_login_feature_failed
string.context: Alert that appears when the user attempted to launch a feature that is not supported.

resources.string: Deze functionaliteit wordt niet ondersteund.

string.name: wp_ellipsize_long_banner
string.context: If a banner is longer than 100 characters, it will cut it off and use this string. %1$@ is the string's first 100 characters

string.name: wp_login_generic_missingapplicationtitle_noname
string.context: title for dialog that appears when MyChart wants to launch an app the user does not have. And MyChart does not have a name to call it

resources.string: Applicatie downloaden

string.name: wp_login_generic_missingapplication_noname
string.context: dialog appears when MyChart wants to launch an app the user does not have. And MyChart doesn't know the name of the app

resources.string: Deze applicatie is momenteel niet geïnstalleerd. Wilt u de app installeren om door te gaan?

string.name: wp_login_generic_missingapplication_yes
string.context: option in the dialog to go on to download the linked application

resources.string: Doorgaan

string.name: wp_login_generic_missingapplication_no
string.context: option in the dialog to not install a new app

resources.string: Hier blijven

string.name: wp_login_web_gotobrowser
string.context: message appears when a user clicks on a link in a webview activity that would lead to a new domain. Param 1 is the link being opened.

resources.string: Wilt u deze link buiten de app openen? %1$@

string.name: wp_login_web_yes
string.context: alert button opens a link

resources.string: Doorgaan

string.name: wp_login_web_no
string.context: alert button closes alert without opening the link

resources.string: Hier blijven

string.name: wp_login_passcode_field_accessibility
string.context: Accessibility label for the passcode field. Param 1 is the number of values entered

resources.string: \"Wachtwoordcodeveld. %1$@ van 4 waarden ingevoerd. Beveiligd tekstveld.\"

string.name: wp_login_passcode_backspace_accessibility
string.context: Accessibility label for the passcode backspace button.

resources.string: \"Backspace\"

string.name: wp_login_loading_message
string.context: Accessibility label for the login in spinner.

resources.string: \"Inloggen\"

string.name: wp_login_warning_banner_accessibility
string.context: Accessibility label for the warning banner where %1$@ is the banner text..

resources.string: "Waarschuwing. %1$@"

string.name: wp_login_logging_in_user
string.context: Title for the card we show when we are logging in a user into an org.

resources.string: U wordt ingelogd bij

string.name: wp_login_logging_in_user_ax
string.context: Announcement for AX when we show we are logging in a user into an org. %1$@ Is the name of the organization.

resources.string: U wordt ingelogd bij %1$@

string.name: wp_login_remove_org_button
string.context: Text for a button that removes the selected organization from the login screen.

resources.string: Organisatie verwijderen

string.name: wp_login_remove_org_button_confirm
string.context: Text for a the confirmation on a popup that removes the selected organization from the login screen.

resources.string: Verwijderen

string.name: wp_login_remove_org_button_ax_label
string.context: Accessibility label for a button that removes the selected organization from the login screen. %1$@ is the name of the organization.

resources.string: Organisatie %1$@ verwijderen

string.name: wp_login_remove_org_confirmation_message
string.context: Message in a confirmation popup when removing an organization. %1$@ is the name of the organization.

resources.string: Weet u zeker dat u %1$@ wilt verwijderen?

string.name: wp_login_deep_link_prompt_message
string.context: Message in a toast that appears when a patient taps a link on the login screen which will prompt the patient to log in.

resources.string: Log in om toegang te krijgen tot deze functionaliteit

string.name: wp_login_failed_username_password
string.context: Alert appears when the login failed because the username and or password were incorrect. %1$@ is the org's name for username. %2$@ is the org's name for password

resources.string: Er is een fout opgetreden bij het inloggen met uw %1$@ of %2$@. Probeer het nogmaals.

string.name: wp_login_failed_in_app_review_environment_Android
string.context: Alert appears when the user has enabled a setting designed only to be used by Google Play Store reviewers for approving app submissions.

resources.string: U heeft geprobeerd in te loggen nadat u de instelling Modus app-beoordeling heeft ingeschakeld. Deze instelling is bedoeld voor Google-medewerkers die deze app beoordelen. U moet deze instelling uitschakelen door de app gedwongen te sluiten of door naar het menu met drie stippen bovenaan het scherm te gaan en de functie uit te schakelen.

string.name: wp_login_failed_in_app_review_environment_iOS
string.context: Alert appears when the user has enabled a setting designed only to be used by Apple App Store reviewers for approving app submissions.

resources.string: U heeft geprobeerd in te loggen nadat u de instelling Modus app-beoordeling heeft ingeschakeld. Deze instelling is bedoeld voor Apple-medewerkers die deze app beoordelen. U moet deze instelling uitschakelen door de app gedwongen te sluiten of door naar de app Instellingen te gaan en de functie uit te schakelen.

string.name: wp_login_failed_password_expired
string.context: Alert appears when the login failed because the user's password is expired. The user must log in via the website to reset it. %1$@ is the org's name for password.

resources.string: Uw %1$@ is vervallen. Bezoek de website om dit bij te werken.

string.name: wp_login_failed_login_inactive
string.context: Alert appears when the login failed because the user's account is disabled. The user must be reactivated by the organization

resources.string: Uw account is uitgeschakeld. Neem contact op met uw zorgorganisatie om deze te heractiveren.

string.name: wp_login_failed_login_deleted_error
string.context: Error message displayed when logging in when your MyChart account is deleted.

resources.string: Er was een probleem bij het ophalen van uw medische informatie. Neem contact op met uw zorgorganisatie.

string.name: wp_login_failed_login_expired_error
string.context: Error message displayed when logging in when your MyChart account is expired.

resources.string: Uw account is vervallen. Neem contact op met uw zorgorganisatie.

string.name: wp_login_failed_proxy_account_only_error
string.context: Error message displayed when logging in when your MyChart account is proxy only

resources.string: Deze account is momenteel alleen ingeschakeld als gemachtigdenaccount.

string.name: wp_login_failed_maximum_attampts_exceeded_error
string.context: Error message displayed when logging in when when the user has too many unsuccessful login attempts, preventing the user from logging in.

resources.string: U heeft te veel onsuccesvolle pogingen tot aanmelden gedaan. Uw account is geblokkeerd. Neem contact op met uw zorgorganisatie om deze te heractiveren.

string.name: wp_generic_failed_servererror
string.context: Alert that appears when the app cannot communicate with the server

resources.string: Probleem bij communiceren met de server. Probeer het later nogmaals.

string.name: wp_login_failed_customer_min_version_error
string.context: Alert appears when the customer has set the minimum version to a higher version than what the user has. Where %1$@ is the organization's name

resources.string: Deze versie van de app wordt niet meer ondersteunt door %1$@. Update de app.

string.name: wp_login_failed_phonebook_min_version_title
string.context: Alert title for when Epic has set the minimum MyChart version to a higher version than what the user has

resources.string: Update vereist

string.name: wp_login_failed_passcode_login_error
string.context: Alert appears when there was an issue logging in with passcode and it has been deactivated.

resources.string: Fout bij inloggen met wachtwoordcode. Log in met een andere inlogmethode en schakel uw wachtwoordcode opnieuw in.

string.name: wp_login_failed_biometric_error
string.context: Alert appears when there was an issue logging in with biometric and it has been deactivated.

resources.string: Fout bij inloggen met biometrie. Log in met een andere inlogmethode en schakel inloggen met biometrie opnieuw in.

string.name: wp_login_failed_general
string.context: Alert appears when an unknown error occurs that prevents login. This may not ever be visible to the user

resources.string: Het systeem kan u momenteel niet inloggen. Probeer het later nogmaals.

string.name: wp_login_failed_password_changed_passcode
string.context: Alert appears when passcode login succeeds, but the user's password has been changed. %1$@ is the server's login ID name. %2$@ is the server's login password name

resources.string: Uw %2$@ is gewijzigd. Log in met uw %1$@ en %2$@ en reset uw wachtwoordcode.

string.name: wp_login_failed_password_changed_biometric
string.context: Alert appears when biometric login succeeds, but the user's password has been changed. %1$@ is the server's login ID name. %2$@ is the server's login password name

resources.string: Uw %2$@ is gewijzigd. Log in met uw %1$@ en %2$@ en reset inloggen met biometrie.

string.name: wp_login_failed_secondary_login_password_expired
string.context: Alert appears when secondary login succeeds, but the user's password is expired. %1$@ is the server's login ID name. %2$@ is the server's login password name

resources.string: Uw %2$@ is vervallen. Log in met uw %1$@ en %2$@.

string.name: wp_login_failed_readonly
string.context: Alert appears when the server is in read-only mode, preventing login

resources.string: Op de server die u probeert te bereiken wordt momenteel onderhoud uitgevoerd. Probeer het later nogmaals.

string.name: wp_login_failed_termsconditions
string.context: Alert tells the user that accepting the terms and conditions failed

resources.string: Probleem met uw algemene voorwaarden. Probeer het later nogmaals.

string.name: wp_login_failed_wrong_password_cannotresetpassword
string.context: Error that may be shown to users when they enter the wrong password and also do not have ability to reset password and so we want to warn them ahead of time that their account will be disabled after they exhaust the max number of password attempts. %1$@ is the name of the username field, %2$@ is the name of the password field.

resources.string: Er is een fout opgetreden bij het inloggen met uw %1$@ of %2$@. Uw account wordt uitgeschakeld bij het bereiken van de maximale limiet voor mislukte pogingen.

string.name: wp_login_max_attempts_exceeded_can_reset_password
string.context: Error that may be shown to users when they have exhausted max password attempts but their account is still not disabled because they can reset their password using password recovery. %1$@ is the name of the password field

resources.string: U heeft het maximale aantal mislukte inlogpogingen bereikt. Reset uw %1$@ om weer toegang te krijgen tot uw account.

string.name: wp_login_max_attempts_exceeded_can_reset_password_button
string.context: Pop up button to reset the password. %1$@ is the name of the password field

resources.string: %1$@ resetten

string.name: wp_login_max_attempts_exceeded_cannot_reset_password
string.context: Error that may be shown to users when they have exhausted max password attempts but they cannot reset their password because the password recovery URL has not been configured by the organization.%1$@ is the name of the password field

resources.string: U heeft te veel onsuccesvolle pogingen tot inloggen gedaan. Neem contact op met uw zorgorganisatie om uw %1$@ te resetten.

string.name: wp_login_failed_test_library_expired
string.context: Alert appears when a test library build attempts to log in after the text library expiry date.

resources.string: Testbibliotheek is vervallen.

string.name: wp_login_no_network_title
string.context: Error title that may be shown to users when they have no network connection

resources.string: Netwerkverbinding verplicht

string.name: wp_login_no_network
string.context: Error that may be shown to users when they have no network connection

resources.string: Controleer of uw mobiele gegevensverbinding of wifi-verbinding is ingeschakeld. Start uw apparaat opnieuw op als u nog steeds geen verbinding kunt maken.

string.name: wp_login_organization_change_title
string.context: Title telling the user that the organization they are attempting to switch to is not the same as the organization they launch the app from.

resources.string: Organisatiewijziging

string.name: wp_login_organization_change_message
string.context: Title telling the user that the organization they are attempting to switch to is not the same as the organization they launch the app from. %1$@ is the org name that they launched the app for.

resources.string: Deze melding is voor %1$@. Log hier in om de nieuwe informatie te bekijken.

string.name: wp_deep_link_wrong_org_selection_message
string.context: Title telling the user that the organization they are attempting to switch to is not the same as the organization they are trying to launch a deep link for. %1$@ is the org name that they are launching a deep link for.

resources.string: Deze link is voor %1$@. Log hier in om deze te openen.

string.name: wp_login_organization_not_found_title
string.context: Title telling the user that the organization they are trying to select cannot be found. %1$@ is the internal alphanumeric ID for the organization.

resources.string: Organisatie niet gevonden

string.name: wp_login_organization_not_found_message
string.context: Message telling the user that the organization they are trying to select cannot be found.

resources.string: Sorry, we konden geen organisatie met ID %1$@ vinden om automatisch voor u te selecteren.

string.name: wp_login_organization_not_found_null_message
string.context: Message telling the user that the organization they are trying to select cannot be found.

resources.string: Geen organisatie-ID opgegeven.

string.name: wp_login_failed_to_load_phonebook
string.context: Alert that appears when the user the phonebook failed to load.

resources.string: Kan organisaties niet laden. Probeer het later nogmaals.

string.name: wp_login_failed_to_load_phonebook_try_again
string.context: Alert button that appears when the user the phonebook failed to load. This will retry loading the phonebook

resources.string: Nogmaals proberen

string.name: wp_login_failed_to_open_uri
string.context: Alert that shows to user when the prelogin page can't open a link. %1$@ is the link that tried to open.

resources.string: Kon %1$@ niet openen

string.name: wp_login_failed_server_overload
string.context: The message of the dialog when trying to login to a server that is experiencing a high load. The user will be prevented from logging in.

resources.string: Er is momenteel sprake van zeer hoge vraag. Probeer het later nogmaals.

string.name: wp_login_failed_touch_id_not_set
string.context: Error message when touch id is attempted but it is not set up.

resources.string: Touch ID is niet ingeschakeld.

string.name: wp_login_failed_touch_id_failed
string.context: Error message when touch id is attempted but it fails.

resources.string: We konden uw Touch ID niet valideren.

string.name: wp_login_failed_passcode_not_set
string.context: Error message when touch id is attempted but it is not set up.

resources.string: Er is geen wachtwoordcode ingesteld.

string.name: wp_terms_conditions_could_not_load
string.context: Alert tells the user that the terms and conditions could not be loaded

resources.string: Algemene voorwaarden kunnen momenteel niet worden geladen. Probeer het later nogmaals.

string.name: wp_login_update_in_app_store
string.context: Text on the button that takes the user to the appstore to update the iOS MyChart app

resources.string: App Store

string.name: wp_login_update_in_play_store
string.context: Text on the button that takes the user to the play store to update the Android MyChart app

resources.string: Play Store

string.name: wp_login_need_help_button
string.context: Title of Need help button on the login screen.

resources.string: Hulp nodig?

string.name: wp_login_get_help_title
string.context: Title of Get Help login screen.

resources.string: Om hulp vragen

string.name: wp_login_get_help_subtext
string.context: Subtext of Get Help and Server Error login screens. %1$@ is the organization's name

resources.string: Bekijk als u problemen ondervindt met inloggen bij %1$@ de onderstaande hulpbronnen.

string.name: wp_login_server_error_title
string.context: Title of Server Error screen.

resources.string: Verbindingsfout

string.name: wp_login_server_error_text
string.context: Text if there is a Server Error on the login screen for the mobile application.

resources.string: Probeer de applicatie te sluiten en opnieuw te openen.

string.name: wp_login_get_help_button
string.context: Title of Get help button on the login error pop up.

resources.string: Help

string.name: wp_login_faqs
string.context: Frequently Asked Questions

resources.string: Veelgestelde vragen

string.name: wp_login_saml_error_session_expire
string.context: Message displayed to inform the user that the login assertion provided by the Identity Provider has expired.

resources.string: Uw sessie is verlopen. Log opnieuw in.

string.name: wp_login_saml_error_replay_attack
string.context: Message displayed to inform the user that a replay attack may have occurred, so they were not logged in.

resources.string: We kunnen u momenteel niet aanmelden. Probeer het later nogmaals.

string.name: wp_login_saml_error_no_account
string.context: Message displayed to inform the user that a patient or mychart record does not exist, and could not be created.

resources.string: We konden uw account niet vinden. Neem contact op met de klantenservice. We raden u aan uit te loggen.

string.name: wp_login_saml_error_readonly
string.context: Message displayed to inform the user that the database is in SRO mode.

resources.string: Er wordt momenteel onderhoud uitgevoerd aan het portaal. Probeer het later nogmaals.

string.name: wp_login_saml_error_default
string.context: SAML error message displayed to inform the user that an unknown error occurred during communication with the Identity Provider.

resources.string: Fout bij het verbinding maken met het inlogportaal. Neem contact op met de klantenservice.

string.name: wp_login_saml_error_code
string.context: SAML error code that is added on to the default error message. %1$@ is the original error message and %2$@ is the error code. \n is a new line.

resources.string: %1$@\n\nFoutcode: %2$@

string.name: wp_saml_logout_popup_message
string.context: The message shown in the post SAML logout popup.

resources.string: U bent uitgelogd.

string.name: wp_login_saml_error_login_failure
string.context: Error message displayed when logging in via SAML when the login failed

resources.string: Inlogfout.

string.name: wp_login_saml_error_login_inactive
string.context: Error message displayed when logging in via SAML when your MyChart account is inactive

resources.string: Uw account is inactief. Neem contact op met de klantenservice.

string.name: wp_login_saml_error_unauthorized_website
string.context: Error message displayed when logging in via SAML when the website isn't unauthorized

resources.string: Kan niet authenticeren. Neem contact op met uw systeembeheerder.

string.name: wp_login_saml_error_non_home_access
string.context: Error message displayed when logging in via SAML when logging into a wrong instance of organization

resources.string: Momenteel wordt er onderhoud gepleegd aan uw account. Log uit en probeer het nogmaals. Als dit probleem zich voor blijft doen, neem dan contact op met de webmaster.

string.name: wp_login_saml_error_rehome_or_merge_in_progress
string.context: Error message displayed when logging in via SAML when your MyChart account is temporarily inactive because they are being re-homed

resources.string: Momenteel wordt er onderhoud gepleegd aan uw account. Als dit probleem zich voor blijft doen, neem dan contact op met de webmaster.

string.name: wp_login_saml_error_remote_authorization_failed
string.context: Error message displayed when logging in via SAML when remote authorization failed

resources.string: Deze site ondervindt technische problemen. Probeer het later nogmaals. Blijft het probleem zich voordoen, neem dan contact op met de webmaster.

string.name: wp_login_saml_alert_login_deleted_error
string.context: Error message displayed when logging in when your MyChart account is deleted.

resources.string: Er was een probleem bij het ophalen van uw medische informatie. Neem contact op met uw zorgorganisatie.

string.name: wp_login_saml_alert_login_expired_error
string.context: Error message displayed when logging in when your MyChart account is expired.

resources.string: Uw account is verlopen. Neem contact op met uw zorgorganisatie.

string.name: wp_login_saml_alert_proxy_account_only_error
string.context: Error message displayed when logging in when your MyChart account is proxy only

resources.string: Deze account is momenteel alleen ingeschakeld als gemachtigdenaccount.

string.name: wp_login_saml_alert_maximum_attampts_exceeded_error
string.context: Error message displayed when logging in when when the user has too many unsuccessful login attempts, preventing the user from logging in.

resources.string: U heeft te veel onsuccesvolle pogingen tot aanmelden gedaan. Uw account is geblokkeerd. Neem contact op met uw zorgorganisatie om deze te heractiveren.

string.name: wp_login_saml_error_default_generic_identity_system
string.context: SAML error message displayed to inform the user that an unknown error occurred during communication with the Identity Provider. It will ask the user to log out of that identity provider.

resources.string: Fout bij het verbinding maken met het inlogportaal. Neem contact op met de klantenservice. Zorg er voor dat u uitlogt bij het externe identiteitssysteem.

string.name: wp_login_saml_error_default_identity_system
string.context: SAML error message displayed to inform the user that an unknown error occurred during communication with the Identity Provider. %1$@ Is the name of the identity provider.

resources.string: Fout bij verbinden met inlogportaal. Neem contact op met de klantenservice. Zorg ervoor dat u uitlogt bij %1$@.

string.name: wp_login_saml_error_replay_attack_generic_identity_system
string.context: Message displayed to inform the user that a replay attack may have occurred, so they were not logged in. It will ask the user to log out of that identity provider.

resources.string: We kunnen u momenteel niet aanmelden. Probeer het later nogmaals. Zorg er voor dat u uitlogt bij het externe identiteitssysteem.

string.name: wp_login_saml_error_replay_attack_identity_system
string.context: Message displayed to inform the user that a replay attack may have occurred, so they were not logged in. %1$@ Is the name of the identity provider.

resources.string: We kunnen u momenteel niet aanmelden. Probeer het later nogmaals. Zorg er voor dat u uitlogt bij %1$@.

string.name: wp_login_add_org_info
string.context: Info string on the add organization button.

resources.string: Kunt u één van uw organisaties niet vinden?

string.context: Add organization text for the button to add orgs to your login screen

resources.string: Organisatie toevoegen

string.name: wp_login_add_another_org
string.context: Add organization text for the button to add another org to your login screen

resources.string: Nog een organisatie toevoegen

string.name: wp_login_need_help_from_epic_label
string.context: Label above the button that launches the Epic-managed, self-service help tool on MyChart.org.

resources.string: Hulp nodig?

string.name: wp_login_get_help_from_epic_button
string.context: Label on the button that launches the Epic-managed, self-service help tool on MyChart.org.

resources.string: Ga voor hulp naar MyChart.org

string.name: wp_login_passcode_entry_deletebutton_accessibility_text
string.context: Accessibility text for the delete button displayed in passcode entry numpad that deletes passcode characters entered by user

resources.string: Verwijderen

string.name: wp_login_passcode_prompt
string.context: Text prompting the user to enter their passcode

resources.string: Wachtwoordcode invoeren

plurals.name: wp_login_wrong_passcode_attempts
plurals.context: Message shown to the user when they enter the wrong passcode and they have %1$@ remaining attempts

string.name: wp_login_alert_passcode_wrong_no_more_tries
string.context: The message of dialog when try to login with wrong passcode but cannot try again

resources.string: U heeft geen resterende pogingen. Log in met een andere inlogmethode om uw wachtwoordcode te resetten.

string.name: wp_login_biometric_popup_title
string.context: Title of biometric login popup. %1$@ is the organization's name

resources.string: Inloggen met biometrie voor \"%1$@\"

string.name: wp_login_biometric_popup_subtitle
string.context: Subtitle of biometric login popup

resources.string: Scan uw biometrie om in te loggen.

string.name: wp_login_new_alert_biometric_changed_error
string.context: The message shown when there's an error caused by a change in the user's registered biometric.

resources.string: Er is een wijziging doorgevoerd in de opgeslagen biometrie van uw apparaat. Log in met een andere inlogmethode en schakel inloggen met biometrie opnieuw in.

string.name: wp_login_alert_biometric_max_attempts_error
string.context: The message shown when there's an error caused by a user failing biometric too many times, requiring user to log into MyChart and re-enable it.

resources.string: Te veel pogingen. Log in met een andere inlogmethode en schakel inloggen met biometrie opnieuw in.

string.name: wp_login_alert_biometric_permanent_lockout
string.context: The message shown when the device biometric sensor has been disabled due to too many attempts, requiring user to unlock the device with different method, then re-enable it from MyChart.

resources.string: De biometrie van het apparaat is uitgeschakeld als gevolg van te veel pogingen. Gebruik een andere methode om uw apparaat te ontgrendelen, log in en schakel inloggen met biometrie opnieuw in.

string.name: wp_login_biometric_unknown_error
string.context: The message shown when an unknown error occurs while the user is logging in with biometrics.

resources.string: Probleem bij het inloggen met de opgeslagen biometrie van uw apparaat. Probeer het nogmaals of log in met een andere inlogmethode.

string.name: wp_login_secondary_login_method_disabled_by_organization
string.context: The message shown when the user attempts to login with a secondary login method (passcode or biometric) that has been disabled by the organization

resources.string: Deze inlogmethode is uitgeschakeld. Probeer het nogmaals met een andere inlogmethode.

string.name: wp_secondarylogin_inuse_message_and_covid_rat
string.context: The message in dialog showed when a user is enabling secondary login and a secondary login method and/or prelogin covid has already been set for another user. %1$@ is the name of biometric method for secondary login, like Touch ID. %2$@ is the name of the organization

resources.string: Er is op dit apparaat al een wachtwoordcode, %1$@ of Voorbeeld COVID-19-status ingesteld voor een andere gebruiker bij %2$@. Door een nieuwe wachtwoordcode of %1$@ in te stellen, worden deze verwijderd voor de andere gebruiker. Wilt u doorgaan?

string.name: wp_passcode_login_inuse_message_and_covid_rat
string.context: The message in dialog showed when a user is enabling passcode and a passcode and/or prelogin covid has already been set for another user. %1$@ is the name of the organization

resources.string: Er is op dit apparaat al een wachtwoordcode of Voorbeeld COVID-19-status ingesteld voor een andere gebruiker bij %1$@. Door een nieuwe wachtwoordcode in te stellen, worden deze verwijderd voor de andere gebruiker. Wilt u doorgaan?

string.name: wp_passcode_login_inuse_message
string.context: The message in dialog showed when a passcode login method has already been set for another user. %1$@ is the name of the organization

resources.string: Er is op dit apparaat al een wachtwoordcode ingesteld voor een andere gebruiker bij %1$@. Door een nieuwe wachtwoordcode in te stellen wordt deze verwijderd voor de andere gebruiker. Wilt u doorgaan?

string.name: wp_password_update_issue_updating_auth_tokens
string.context: Message shown to a user when they successfully update their password, but there is an issue updating auth tokens on their device.

resources.string: Uw wachtwoord is gewijzigd, maar er is een probleem opgetreden bij het bijwerken van uw gekoppelde apparaat. Ga opnieuw naar Accountinstellingen om alle mislukte functionaliteiten opnieuw in te schakelen.

string.name: wp_account_settings_touchid_label
string.context: Name used for describing the iOS Touch ID login method. Used in a sentences like 'A passcode or Touch ID has already been enabled at this organization.'

resources.string: Touch ID

string.name: wp_account_settings_faceid_label
string.context: Name used for describing the iOS Face ID login method. Used in a sentences like 'A passcode or Face ID has already been enabled at this organization.'

resources.string: Face ID

string.name: wp_account_settings_opticid_label
string.context: Name used for describing the iOS Optic ID login method. Used in a sentences like 'A passcode or Optic ID has already been enabled at this organization.'

resources.string: Optic ID

string.name: wp_rat_covid_login_error_secondary_login
string.context: Error message shown to a user when a login using a restricted access token for Covid Preview fails, and the error is caused by an invalid secondary device token.

resources.string: Er is een wijziging doorgevoerd aan de gekoppelde apparaten van uw account. Log in en schakel Voorbeeld COVID-19-status opnieuw in.

string.name: wp_rat_covid_login_error_secondary_login_password_changed
string.context: Error message shown to a user when a login using a restricted access token for Covid Preview fails, and the error is caused by their password being changed.

resources.string: Uw wachtwoord is gewijzigd. Log in en schakel Voorbeeld COVID-19-status opnieuw in.

string.name: wp_rat_covid_login_error_secondary_login_password_expired
string.context: Error message shown to a user when a login using a restricted access token for Covid Preview fails, and the error is caused by their password being expired.

resources.string: Log in om het Voorbeeld COVID-19-status weer te kunnen openen.

string.name: wp_rat_covid_login_error_account_inactive
string.context: Error message shown to a user when a login using a restricted access token for Covid Preview fails, and the error is caused by an inactive account

resources.string: Er was een probleem bij het openen van uw account. Log in en schakel Voorbeeld COVID-19-status opnieuw in.

string.name: wp_rat_covid_login_error_general
string.context: Error message shown to a user when a login using a restricted access token for Covid Preview fails, and the error is general

resources.string: Kan uw Voorbeeld COVID-19-status niet laden. Probeer het later nogmaals.

string.name: wp_refusal_name
string.context: Display name for a patient who has refusal on file (Finland patients). %1$@ is the main name of the person and %2$@ is their service area

string.name: wp_login_test_library_expiry_reminder_title
string.context: Title for an alert with the current version and expiry date. Appears during a successful test library build login, before the user can go further.

resources.string: Dit is een testbibliotheek
